title: Carson McKee
text: Carson joined the PhD in Statistics Research programme in 2022. Prior to joining King’s, he graduated from the University of St. Andrews in 2020 with an MMath in Mathematics & Statistics and then worked as a software engineer at Bank of America from 2020-2022.

title: Carson McKee
text:
Education
King’s College London | PhD - Statistics | Sept 2022 - Present
University of St. Andrews | MMath - Mathematics and Statistics (1st) | Sept 2016 - June 2020

title: Carson McKee
text:
Experience
Bank of America Merrill Lynch | Software Engineer | August 2020 - September 2022
British Army Reserve | Troop Leader | June 2017 - June 2020
